/*New Palindrome
Rishabh wants to give a nice gift to his friend Naman. naman loves only two type of digit input1(0-9) and input2(0-9).
you can see that naman name is palindrome so naman loves only palindrome number.Rishabh have array of n number in which all
number are two digit and contain only input1 and input2. for example if input1=1 and input2=2 then array element is like
11,12,21,22. Rishabh want to give gift to his friend maximum palindrome number but there is twist in this situation there
are multiple solution of maximum length then he want to gift minimum number.

Input
Input1: first digit which naman like.
Input2: second digit which naman like.
Input3: n (length of array)
Input4[]: element of array.

Output:
output is palindrome string of maximum length and if multiple solution are possible then output is minimum number.

Example

Input1: 1
Input2: 2
Input3: 2
Input4: {11,22}

Ouput
1122

Explenation
All palindrom possible are 11,22,1122,2211. so palindrome string having maximum length are 1122 and 2211.
minimum is 1122 so output is 1122.

Lang: CPP
Author: Shubham
*/


#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define pb push_back

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int N;
        cin >> N;
        string s;
        map<string,int>F;
        // F is the map storing frequency of each pair
        rep(i,N){
            cin >> s;
            F[s]++;
        }
        char ans[7000];
        int top=0;
        rep(i,(int)F["aa"]/2){
         ans[top++]='a';
         ans[top++]='a';
        }

        rep(i,min(F["ab"],F["ba"])){
            ans[top++]='a';
            ans[top++]='b';
        }

        rep(i,F["bb"]/2){
            ans[top++]='b';
            ans[top++]='b';
        }

        if(F["aa"]&1){
            ans[top++]='a';
         ans[top++]='a';
        }
        else if(F["bb"]&1){
            ans[top++]='b';
         ans[top++]='b';
        }

        rep(i,F["bb"]/2){
            ans[top++]='b';
         ans[top++]='b';
        }

        rep(i,min(F["ab"],F["ba"])){
            ans[top++]='b';
         ans[top++]='a';
        }
        rep(i,F["aa"]/2){
            ans[top++]='a';
         ans[top++]='a';
        }
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<top;i++){
            cout<<ans[i];
        }
        cout<<"\n";
        }
    return 0;
}
